page.title: 10MY HOUSE IN GLASGOW
page.content: MY HOUSE IN GLASGOW WAS NEAR SHOPS. MY SCHOOL WAS NOT FAR FROM MY HOME.I ENJOYED STAYING IN GLASGOW BECAUSE YOU WERE NOT FAR FROM A SHOPPING CENTRE.WHAT I DID NOT LIKE ABOUT WHERE I STAYED WAS THAT YOU HAD TO CROSS A MAIN ROAD TO GET TO THE SWING PARK. I DID NOT LIKE ALL THE GRAFFITI ON THE BUILDINGS BECAUSE IT RUINS THEM. I LIKE MY HOUSE IN CUMBERNAULD BETTER BECAUSE THERE ARE WALKWAYS FOR PEDESTRIANS AND THE MAIN ROADS ARE ONLY FOR CARS, BUSES AND LORRIES. THE SWING PARKS ARE NOT FAR FROM YOUR HOME AND I AM VERY GLAD THAT I MOVED TO CUMBERNAULD.
